name: WFC Testing
description:
Made for secret santa game jam but switched giftees late into the jam and also started from scratch (the first game idea didn't work) and I got too preoccupied with level generation that I ran out of time to have actual gameplay.  Pretty happy with the results and I'm gonna try and fix up the bugs (many) and post the source code for simple wave function collapse in unity.

Move with W A S D and use right click to look around.
